ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: A long long time ago in a galaxy far away. ... She looked at Cyber Claw. Have you newly arrived to this planet? I thought the breaking of the groups was common

A long long time ago in a galaxy far away. 

::KitKat::
She looked at Cyber Claw."Have you newly arrived to this planet? I 
thought the breaking of the groups was common knowledge.  Well, let 
me explain then.  A long time ago, there were only a few groups 
here.  The Predacons were in three main groups, The Allience that was 
under a bot named Zardus.  The predacons under Hell Beast and the 
Predacons under Megatron's rule.   Hell Beast was sent back to 
Cybertron.  Megatron deserted his group.  I was in Megatron's group.  
He left us to die and I took over.  Black Aracnia was originally 
under Megatron (correct me on that if I'm wrong)  and left as well.  
After Hell Beast left, his groups spit up, becoming the Destrons and 
such.  Or they joined the Allience.  The Allience is a strong group. 
but mine is growing and becoming stronger.  If Black Aracnia and I 
join up, we may convince others to join.  Then we can finally work to 
our common goals.  First off, revenge. Then, the maximals."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Cyber Claw:
> 
> 
> 
> Cyber Claw glanced down at KitKat, trying to figure all of this 
> out. "The Predacons split up? Explain this."
